function.name: str_replace_editor

args.new_str:
# Calculate the rewards for real and generated responses
        real_rewards = policy_real_logps - opponent_real_logps
        generated_rewards = policy_generated_logps - opponent_generated_logps

        # Calculate the SPIN losses
        if self.loss_type == "sigmoid":
            losses = F.softplus(-self.beta * (real_rewards - generated_rewards))
        elif self.loss_type == "hinge":
            losses = F.relu(1 - self.beta * (real_rewards - generated_rewards))
        else:
            raise ValueError(f"Unsupported loss type: {self.loss_type}")

        return losses, real_rewards, generated_rewards
